scripts.postinstall: mkdir -p wwwroot/lib/fontawesome/css wwwroot/lib/chart.js && cp node_modules/@fortawesome/fontawesome-free/css/all.min.css wwwroot/lib/fontawesome/css/all.min.css && cp -r node_modules/@fortawesome/fontawesome-free/webfonts wwwroot/lib/fontawesome/ && cp node_modules/chart.js/dist/chart.umd.min.js wwwroot/lib/chart.js/chart.umd.min.js
